items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that renders Jianpu (numbered notation) from MusicXML or JSON to SVG/CANVAS. Features dynamic layout, interactivity, and real-time updates for web music apps.

items.content_html: A fullstack application based on JS technologies. React with ui libraries for frontend and Node for backend. Server has the architecture of microservices using routing. The front uses powerful custom hooks, memo, caching and advance lightweight routing with dynamic path + location
items.title: VladAndreiToma/physics-io: A fullstack application based on JS technologies. React with ui libraries for frontend and Node for backend. Server has the architecture of microservices using routing. The front uses powerful custom hooks, memo, caching and advance lightweight routing with dynamic path + location

items.content_html: EdisonDevTools is a space for sharing development tools in React, PHP, Python & JavaScript. We create lightweight solutions to simplify coding challenges. EdisonDevTools es un espacio para compartir herramientas de desarrollo en React, PHP, Python y JavaScript. Creamos soluciones ligeras para simplificar la programación.

items.content_html: psfree-lapse is a lightweight tool that simplifies the process of creating time-lapse videos from still images. It supports various image formats and allows users to customize frame rates for smooth playback.
